entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:38 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 10:59 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: NE 18 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets late this evening and after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 10:04 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:04 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening. Forecast issued 10:04 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
